segments.text: I see the boy on the stool, and my heart is racing—he’s going to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s not even holding on to anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m terrified that he’s going to crash onto the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him doesn’t seem to realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch—I think I need to look away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making the floor slippery, and that’s just adding to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m so scared for that boy—he’s going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely unaware of what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching a disaster unfold in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of the most nerve-wracking things I’ve ever seen.
segments.speaker: PAR
